contributionRewardExt scheme which       manage and allocate the rewards for the competition."}},"proposeCompetition(string,int256,uint256[3],address,uint256[],uint256[5])":{"details":"Submit a competion proposal","params":{"_competitionParams":"competition parameters :        _competitionParams[0] - competition startTime        _competitionParams[1] - _votingStartTime competition voting start time        _competitionParams[2] - _endTime competition end time        _competitionParams[3] - _maxNumberOfVotesPerVoter on how many suggestions a voter can vote        _competitionParams[4] - _suggestionsEndTime suggestion submition end time","_descriptionHash":"A hash of the proposal's description","_externalToken":"Address of external token, if reward is requested there","_reputationChange":"- Amount of reputation change requested .Can be negative.","_rewardSplit":"an array of precentages which specify how to split the rewards        between the winning suggestions","_rewards":"rewards array:        rewards[0] - Amount of tokens requested per period        rewards[1] - Amount of ETH requested per period        rewards[2] - Amount of external tokens requested per period"},"return":"proposalId the proposal id."},"redeem(uint256,address)":{"details":"redeem a winning suggestion reward","params":{"_beneficiary":"- the reward beneficiary.       this parameter is take into account only if the msg.sender is the suggestion's suggester,       otherwise the _beneficiary param is ignored and the beneficiary is suggestion's suggester.","_suggestionId":"suggestionId"}},"sendLeftOverFunds(bytes32)":{"details":"sendLeftOverFund send letf over funds back to the dao.","params":{"_proposalId":"the proposal getOrderedIndexOfSuggestion(uint256).details: getOrderedIndexOfSuggestion return the index of specific suggestion in the winners list.

params._contributionRewardExt: the contributionRewardExt scheme which       manage and allocate the rewards for the competition.

params._competitionParams: competition parameters :        _competitionParams[0] - competition startTime        _competitionParams[1] - _votingStartTime competition voting start time        _competitionParams[2] - _endTime competition end time        _competitionParams[3] - _maxNumberOfVotesPerVoter on how many suggestions a voter can vote        _competitionParams[4] - _suggestionsEndTime suggestion submition end time
params._descriptionHash: A hash of the proposal's description
params._externalToken: Address of external token, if reward is requested there
params._reputationChange: - Amount of reputation change requested .Can be negative.
params._rewardSplit: an array of precentages which specify how to split the rewards        between the winning suggestions
params._rewards: rewards array:        rewards[0] - Amount of tokens requested per period        rewards[1] - Amount of ETH requested per period        rewards[2] - Amount of external tokens requested per period

params._beneficiary: - the reward beneficiary.       this parameter is take into account only if the msg.sender is the suggestion's suggester,       otherwise the _beneficiary param is ignored and the beneficiary is suggestion's suggester.

sendLeftOverFunds(bytes32).details: sendLeftOverFund send letf over funds back to the dao.

setSnapshotBlock(bytes32).details: setSnapshotBlock set the block for the reputaion snapshot

params._proposalId: the proposal id this suggestion is referring to.
